## `airquality`

`airquality` provides daily air quality measurements in New York, May to September 1973. 

It is included in `datasets` package, that is included in base R.

You just need to type `airquality` to access data.

For a description of data, refer to the help.

```{r airquality_help, eval=FALSE}
?airquality
```

Since the temperature is shown in degrees Fahrenheit, can be useful to create a new variable with degrees Celsius.

```{r airquality_tempC}
airquality <- airquality %>% mutate(Temp_C = (Temp-32)/1.8)
```
